app_name.description: The name of the extension, displayed in the web store.

app_desc.message: Get Meta App Referrals from the Store!
app_desc.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the web store.

body_text_p1.message: With this extension you can get easy access to Meta App Referrals. If you navigate to a Meta App Store page and the App has a Referral in our systems, a new button will appear. On pressing it, you will receive the discount, which you must accept.

body_text_p2.message: Currently the Advocates receive some credit when you buy a game using their referral, and the Friends receive the 25% discount immediately. The referral that you get is completely random, to make it fair and shift the focus on Friends getting discounts rather than Advocates getting credit.

body_farewell.message: We hope you enjoy it! Made with 💖 in Alicante 🌞
